_AdaptiveFunctionErrorThrown_.description: An object entry of _AdaptiveFunction_ errorsThrown list.

error.description: This is the error id of the error that can be thrown.
error.title: Error

reason.description: This is the reason the error can be thrown.
reason.title: Reason

_AdaptiveFunctionGenerate_.description: This is the object type for objects in the generate/objects/_AdaptiveFunctionGenerate_/ of command, core, and extension source directories. These objects are used by the 'dev.py generate' script to generate _AdaptiveFunction_ objects.

additionalArgCheck.description: Additional argument checking is needed. This is residual from before auto casting so may be deprecated in the future.
additionalArgCheck.title: Additional Arg Check

afwCamelCaseFunctionLabel.description: This is the functionLabel prefixed with 'afw' and converted to camel case.
afwCamelCaseFunctionLabel.title: Prefixed Camel Case

brief.description: This is a predicate for the function with the first letter capitalized and without a trailing period.
brief.title: Brief

camelCaseFunctionLabel.description: This is the functionLabel converted to camel case.
camelCaseFunctionLabel.title: Camel Case

dataType.description: If present, this is a method for this data type.
dataType.title: Data Type

dataTypeMethod.description: If true, this is a data type method that can be called polymorphically or by prefixing the function with the data type followed by double colons ('::').
dataTypeMethod.title: Data Type Method

deprecated.description: This indicates that the function is deprecated and may go away at some point.
deprecated.title: Deprecated

description.description: This is the function's description, used for documentation purposes.
description.title: Description

details.description: This is a sentence that contains details about the other properties of this function.
details.title: Details

errorsThrown.description: Errors that can be thrown by this function.

items.description: Errors that can be thrown by this function.
items.title: Errors thrown by this function

errorsThrown.title: Errors Thrown

op.description: This is the function's operator. This is not used at the moment, but may be used in a future expression syntax.
op.title: Operator

polymorphic.description: This indicates that this function can be called polymorphically without specifying the <Type>:: qualifier. The appropriate implementation of the function will be called based on the dataType and/or dataTypeParameter of the first function parameter value.
polymorphic.title: Polymorphic

polymorphicDataTypes.description: This function will call the appropriate function when the first parameter is one of these data types.

items.description: This function will call the appropriate function when the first parameter is one of these data types.
items.title: This function will call the appropriate function when the first parameter is one of these data types

polymorphicDataTypes.title: Polymorphic Data Types

polymorphicExecuteFunction.description: This is the label in the C source of the polymorphic execute function used for this function.
polymorphicExecuteFunction.title: Polymorphic Function Label

polymorphicExecuteFunctionEvaluatesFirst.description: If true, the first parameter evaluate is deferred to polymorphicExecuteFunction function. If false or not specified, standard polymorphic function processing evaluates the first parameter to determine the appropriate evaluate to call.
polymorphicExecuteFunctionEvaluatesFirst.title: Defer Evaluate

polymorphicOverrides.description: This allows overrides, for particular data types, of properties for this function.
polymorphicOverrides.title: Polymorphic Function Label

pure.description: This indicates that, given exactly the same parameter values, this function will always return the same result and will not cause any side effects.
pure.title: Pure

scriptSupport.description: This property can only be true for afw core functions that supports a statement in adaptive script. If true, there must be a #define in afw_value.h of the form 'AFW_VALUE_CALL_SCRIPT_SUPPORT_NUMBER_' followed by the upper case of the functionId to specify the special number associated with this function along with supporting code in afw_function_script.c.
scriptSupport.title: Script support

sideEffects.description: Any side effects that this function may produce as a result of execution.

items.description: Any side effects that this function may produce as a result of execution.
items.title: Side effects for this function

sideEffects.title: Side Effects

signatureOnly.description: This is a signature with an unimplemented execute function.
signatureOnly.title: Signature Only

useExecuteFunction.description: This is the label in the C source of the execute function used for this function.
useExecuteFunction.title: Use Execute Function

brief.description: This is a predicate for the parameter with the first letter capitalized and without a trailing period.
brief.title: Brief

canBeUndefined.description: Indicates that parameter can be undefined (NULL) even if not optional.
canBeUndefined.title: Optional

dataType.description: This is the data type id for this parameter's value.
dataType.title: Data Type

dataTypeParameter.description: See the data type's dataTypeParameterType property to determine how to interpret this.
dataTypeParameter.title: Data Type Parameter

description.description: This is the description of this parameter.
description.title: Description

minArgs.description: This is the minimum number of values that can be specified for this parameter. If -1, the parameter can be specified exactly once. This can only have a value other than -1 on last parameter where it can have a value of -1 to 127.
minArgs.title: Min Args

name.description: This is the name of this parameter.
name.title: Name

optional.description: This indicates that parameter is optional and can be undefined (NULL).
optional.title: Optional

polymorphicDataType.description: The dataType for this parameter is <Type>.
polymorphicDataType.title: Polymorphic Data Type

polymorphicDataTypeParameter.description: The dataTypeParameter for this parameter is <Type>.
polymorphicDataTypeParameter.title: Polymorphic Data Type Parameter
